channel.title: Need help with changing client name and background!
channel.description:
Ok so i was researching on how to do this, and appearently i just go into the client files and find gui.java and type in the original server name which would be 'BrokenX' but nothing appears, so i also tried doing that in client.java and i changed anything that was already BrokenX to mine which is Based World but still nothing changes. Please explain why? Or give me a different method of changing this. As for the background i was told to just look for the image in a 'sprites' folder, but i don't have a folder called sprites. All i have is a file that's a notepad file. Here's pics of what i'm trying to change if you don't understand:
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/683/86327582.png/][IMG]http://img683.imageshack.us/img683/6370/86327582.png[/img][/URL]

item.title: Need help with changing client name and background!
item.dc:creator: @Mr.czar Mr.czar
item.description:
@Mr.czar wrote:

You look in the sprites folder for the background image, if it’s not in there I cannot help you because, it will be in-coded into the main file.dat and you will need toms cache suite to change it you can find tut’s online for that.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with changing client name and background!
